summary: BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff modifies project_state.json to describe and track many new product features (including multiple referenced REQ IDs) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project state to describe building “PromptFarm AI” with extensive SaaS features (prompt library/marketplace, categories, search/filters, prompt details & copy, user accounts/favorites/dashboard, monetization, marketing pages, SEO) and enumerated multiple features tied to REQ-1..REQ-5 (and more) despite the BuildRequest having no requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists no requirements and no acceptance criteria, so implementing/tracking these features is not grounded in the request.
